summary: Modified <leader>ls keybinding in tex.lua to show 'Already on main file' notification when VimtexToggleMain would have no effect. Verified Neovim startup and module loading pass.

artifacts.summary: Wrapped leader-ls mapping with function to check main file status

completion_data.completion_summary: Added informative notification to <leader>ls keybinding that shows 'Already on main file' when user presses the toggle while on the main LaTeX file, instead of silently doing nothing.

next_steps: Test changes by opening a LaTeX file and pressing <leader>ls to see the notification
